description.zh-cn: 中国毛泽东思想研究者、军事学家、演讲家，南开大学教授、博士生导师，中国非军事院校首个军事学硕士点的创始人。
description.en: A Chinese researcher of Mao Zedong Thought, military scientist, and public speaker. He was a professor and doctoral supervisor at Nankai University and the founder of the first military science master's program in a non-military university in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的直辖市，艾跃进的出生地和逝世地。
description.en: A municipality in China, which is the birthplace and place of death of Ai Yuejin.

description.zh-cn: 中国的直辖市，艾跃进的祖籍所在地。
description.en: A municipality in China, which is the ancestral home of Ai Yuejin.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于重庆市的县，是艾跃进的祖籍地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Chongqing, it is the ancestral home of Ai Yuejin.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的一所著名高等学府，是艾跃进的母校和长期工作单位。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Tianjin, China. It is Ai Yuejin's alma mater and long-term employer.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，艾跃进是其党员。
description.en: The ruling political party of China, of which Ai Yuejin was a member.

description.zh-cn: 一种源自胃黏膜上皮细胞的恶性肿瘤，是导致艾跃进逝世的病因。
description.en: A malignant tumor originating from the epithelial cells of the gastric mucosa, which was the cause of Ai Yuejin's death.

nodes.id: 南开大学马克思主义学院

zh-cn: 南开大学马克思主义学院
南开马克思主义教育学院

description.zh-cn: 南开大学下属的学院，艾跃进在此担任教授及博士生导师。
description.en: A school within Nankai University where Ai Yuejin served as a professor and doctoral supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 位于天津市的研究机构。
description.en: A research institution located in Tianjin.

nodes.id: 南开大学军事学军事思想专业

zh-cn: 南开大学军事学军事思想专业
en: Nankai University Military Science and Military Thought Program

description.zh-cn: 由艾跃进在南开大学创办的中国非军事院校第一个军事学硕士点。该专业后于2016年1月改为“马克思主义中国化研究”专业。
description.en: The first master's program in military science at a non-military university in China, founded by Ai Yuejin at Nankai University. The program was later changed to the 'Sinicized Marxism Studies' program in January 2016.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家级国防教育专家库。
description.en: A national-level pool of experts for defense education in China.

nodes.id: 南开大学马克思主义中国化研究专业

zh-cn: 南开大学马克思主义中国化研究专业
马克思主义中国化研究专业
en: Nankai University Sinicized Marxism Studies Program

description.zh-cn: 南开大学的一个专业，由原“军事学军事思想”专业于2016年1月改名而来。
description.en: A program at Nankai University, which was renamed from the original 'Military Science and Military Thought Program' in January 2016.
Ai Yuejin died of stomach cancer.

description.zh-cn: 艾跃进从南开大学获得学士学位后便留校工作，后组建军事教研室。
description.en: After obtaining his bachelor's degree from Nankai University, Ai Yuejin stayed on to work and later established the military teaching and research section.

relationships.target: 南开大学马克思主义学院
南开大学军事学军事思想专业

description.zh-cn: 艾跃进创办了南开大学军事学军事思想专业，这是中国首次在非军事院校设立军事学硕士点。
description.en: Ai Yuejin founded the Military Science and Military Thought program at Nankai University, which was the first time a military science master's program was established in a non-military university in China.

relationships.target: 南开大学军事学军事思想专业
南开大学马克思主义中国化研究专业

position.zh-cn: 硕士研究生及博士研究生导师

relationships.source: 南开大学军事学军事思想专业
relationships.target: 南开大学马克思主义中国化研究专业

description.zh-cn: 2016年1月起，南开大学原“军事学军事思想”专业改为南开马克思主义教育学院“马克思主义中国化研究”专业。
description.en: Starting from January 2016, the original 'Military Science and Military Thought Program' at Nankai University was changed to the 'Sinicized Marxism Studies Program' under the Nankai Institute of Marxist Education.

relationships.source: 南开大学马克思主义学院
南开大学军事学军事思想专业
